column2: Making a network request with user-controlled data in the URL allows for request forgery attacks.
column4: The [["URL"|"relative:///VulnFinder-CodeQL-main/src/javascript-cwe/CWE-918/examples/RequestForgeryBad.js:7:14:7:55"]] of this request depends on a [["user-provided value"|"relative:///VulnFinder-CodeQL-main/src/javascript-cwe/CWE-918/examples/RequestForgeryBad.js:4:28:4:34"]].
